2.desc1: The biggest difference in BeepBot versus other bots is that it is fully cloud-based. Most bots are downloaded onto your PC which takes up precious resources and can cause lag at the most inopportune times.
2.desc2: BeepBot being cloud-based means that no matter where you go (convention, Microsoft Store Event, traveling, etc) BeepBot is ready to help run your stream without the need of packing your PC or backing up your bot software/configurations onto a USB drive. It is ready to perform when you are!
2.desc3: We have also added in a robust event system called IFTBT (If This Beep That). The system allows for your creativity to shine through on your streams without needing to code custom scripts to get them to communicate.
